mapper.select: select rt.*, rv.rv_idx from reservation_info rv left join rent_info rt on rv.p_idx = rt.p_idx and rv.user_idx = rt.user_idx where rv.user_idx = #{user_idx} and rv.p_idx = #{p_idx}
select * from rent_info where return_date is null and user_idx = #{user_idx} and p_idx = #{p_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into rent_info select rent_info_seq.nextval,p_idx,user_idx,'N',rv_start_date,rv_end_date,'N',null from reservation_info where rv_idx = #{rv_idx}
mapper.update: update rent_info set r_status = 'Y' where p_idx = #{p_idx} and r_status = 'N' and return_chk = 'N'
update rent_info set return_chk = 'Y' where p_idx = #{p_idx} and return_chk = 'N' and return_date is null
update rent_info set return_date = sysdate where p_idx = #{p_idx} and return_chk = 'Y' return_date is null
